projects: [{"title":"Engineering drawing comparison tool","start_date":"Jan 2024","end_date":"Feb 2024","description":"● Created a comparison tool for engineering drawings that highlights changes with color-coded markers and supports multiple file formats.● Enhanced an engineering drawing tool with OpenCV and pytesseract to highlight numerical modifications for precise verification."},{"title":"Establish a strong security policy in the database","start_date":"Oct 2023","end_date":"Jan 2024","description":"● Constructed a sophisticated row-level policy to effectively limit user access to the database, enabling retrieval of organization-specific data● Employed user-specific variables in transactions to effectively handle concurrency, and offer segregated and suitable data handling options."},{"title":"Migration strategy from AWS to Azure Services.","start_date":"Oct 2022","end_date":"Nov 2022","description":"● Designed architectures while carefully taking into account Azure costs and provide recommendations for right-sizing data infrastructure.● Managed CI/CD pipelines for numerous services such as Azure web app, Static web app, and the Azure functions in Azure DevOps."},{"title":"Analytical dashboard","start_date":"May 2022","end_date":"May 2022","description":"• Created an analytical dashboard for appropriate data visualization and business problem analysis using Power Bi. - Built a dynamic data source using power query and implemented several DAX functions for various fact calculations. - Installed and configured an on-premise power bi-gateway for live connection updates of the analytical dashboard."},{"title":"User friendly Infinite virtual scroll","start_date":"Mar 2022","end_date":"Apr 2022","description":"• Reduced the query's time complexity while scrolling on a user-friendly list page having an infinite virtual scrolling list. - Built a materialized view to make it a simple query and reduce the time by up to 100 ms for every 50 instinct of data. - Implemented indexing in the materialized view to reduce the execution time of the PostgreSQL query to a nominal time."},{"title":"Built Microservice","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"• Designed and implemented microservices architecture using SAM AWS based on required solutions and strategies. - Recognized the APIs that need to have microservices and finalized the language(Javascript) according to lambda cold start. - Used Sequelize ORM for database connection and serverless framework to build and deploy microservices to AWS Lambda"},{"title":"Email Service","start_date":"Jun 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"• Reprogrammed the whole email sending code on the AWS platform to optimize the time and cost of the process. - Built an API Gateway to pass the user parameters and to trigger the lambda function for sending an email using SES. - Designed the error handling process to retrieve emails that weren’t sent due to error and send them again using SQS."},{"title":"Real-time mapping of human in the 3D Human Model","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"•Developed an algorithm to create a digital health platform to safely and effectively help physical rehabilitation•Mapped motion of 16 human joints using an OpenPose model for 2-D spatial data and depth info from Kinect•Performed Kalman filter and developed a regression model with an accuracy of 80% to detect a human figure•Programmed the animation of a 3D Human Model with a real-time human using Three.js library in Javascript"},{"title":"Song Recommendation Application","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"•Developed a web scrapping software using Selenium to extract data from 900 posts of music-based Facebook page•Developed a SQL database to manipulate data and to query the information according to the searches•Implemented collaborative filtering and content-based filtering algorithm in the recommendation system"},{"title":"NLP-based video recommender","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"May 2019","description":"•Deployed Naive Bayes classifiers to train a model for grouping of videos into educational and non-educational•Programmed an intelligent recommendation system using keyword extraction from title & description using NLP"},{"title":"Alcoloc","start_date":"Nov 2018","end_date":"Feb 2019","description":"•Part of Silver medal-winning team among 20 teams in Open IIT Product Design competition organised by gymkhana•Designed a product to prevent accidents by measuring the Blood Alcohol Content of a driver before driving•Designed car key slot which will close if the Blood Alcohol Content is found to be more than 0.3mg/ml•Conceptualised a device which would send a signal from the driver's phone to his emergency list using Bluetooth"},{"title":"Recognizing the optimal number of final classes","description":"•Designed a model to overcome the drawbacks of K-means theorem by using Determinantal point process(DPP).•Worked on the K-means algorithm to obtained final clusters by randomly initializing the number of initial clusters. •Developed an algorithm to obtained accurate position of final clusters and store it in Gram matrix•Obtained Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues from Eigen Decomposition of Gram matrix which we use in DPP.•Optimized the number of clusters obtained from K-mean and obtained their centroids, by using DPP"}]
